posts.post_title: Reduced FS - T205 Ed Barger, Full "B" on Cap, Piedmont Fac. 42 - SGC 5
posts.post_content: For Sale - T205 Ed Barger, Full "B" on Cap with a more difficult to find Piedmont Factory 42 reverse, graded SGC 5.  $260 venmo friends or $267.50 pp gs, please message if interested, price includes shipping.  Thanks for looking, Bob I.
